activities.name: Copy SHE TRADE File to Satge

dependsOn.activity: Copy SHE TRADE File to Satge

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcWEDF
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcCRM
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcSHETRADES
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcOLAC
SrcWEDF sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		{Date of birth2} as string,
		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Region as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Title as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		Location as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		{Account Name} as string,
		{English Name} as string,
		Acronym as string,
		{Account Type} as string,
		{Account Sub-Type} as string,
		{Office Address: Country} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Parent Account} as string,
		Confidential as string,
		Activity as string,
		Product as string,
		{Women Managed} as string,
		{Youth Managed} as string,
		{Social media} as string,
		{Other emails} as string,
		{Other phone numbers} as string,
		{Other information} as string,
		{Ownership and management} as string,
		{Trade Forum} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Office Address: City} as string,
		{Office Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing address is equal to office address} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Mailing Address: City} as string,
		{Mailing Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Country} as string,
		{UN Mailing Format} as string,
		{Project Number} as string,
		Salutation as string,
		Account as string,
		Phone as string,
		{Preferred Language} as string,
		{Use account address} as string,
		{Event title} as string,
		{Event type} as string,
		{Course name} as string,
		{Start date} as string,
		{End date} as string,
		{Event date} as string,
		{SME Trade Academy} as string,
		SheTrades as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ALL_COL_FILE_NEW.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagWEDF

schema.name: Please select the area of your activity
Mailing address is equal to office address
